column1: # Bovine Serum Albumin (BSA) - Mixed α/β structure
# Amide I and Amide II regions
#    - Main peak at 1652 cm⁻¹ indicates high α-helix content
#    - Shoulder at 1633 cm⁻¹ indicates some β-sheet
# 2. Amide II (1500-1600 cm⁻¹): N-H bend + C-N stretch
#    - Peak at 1540 cm⁻¹ (shifts in D2O due to H/D exchange)
# 3. Absence of 1625 cm⁻¹ peak: No aggregation/amyloid
